comment.author: 43083230@N08
comment._content: He, he! To není Bílá věž (White Tower), ale Černá věž (Black Tower). Pražský hrad. Loc: 50°5'30.579"N, 14°24'18.73"E

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content: Díky moc! As you say, this is indeed the Black Tower and not the White :) It's situated at Prague Castle. www.prague.net/gallery/prague-castle/pic27.php Thanks for giving us the correct information on this building! /Anna B.
